targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  1 as "join",
  sb.subfield_name,
  ss.name as sector_name,
  ls.name,
  sca4_temp
FROM
  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
  inner join loop_sensors ls on td.loop_id = ls.loop_id
  inner join sca_sensors sca on ls.loop_id = sca.loop_id
  inner join subfield_sensors sb on ls.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
WHERE
  test_id = $test_id and sca4_temp > 300 and sca_position = 4
order by sca4_temp asc limit 10

SELECT
  1 as "join",
  avg(sca4_temp) as average,
--  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
--  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
--  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5",
  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10"
FROM
(SELECT
  sca4_temp
FROM
  temperature_dt_scas_daily td inner join loop_sensors ls on td.loop_id = ls.loop_id
WHERE
  test_id = $test_id and sca4_temp > 300 
) s1

select
	subfield_name,
	sector_name,
	name
from (
	select
	  sb.subfield_name,
	  ss.name as sector_name,
	  ls.name,
	  sca4_temp
	FROM
	  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
	  inner join loop_sensors ls on td.loop_id = ls.loop_id
	  inner join sca_sensors sca on ls.loop_id = sca.loop_id
	  inner join subfield_sensors sb on ls.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
	  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
	WHERE
	  sca4_temp > 300 and sca_position = 4 and 
	  test_id in (select distinct(test_id)
			from temperature_dt_scas_test tdst 
			inner join temperature_dt_scas_daily td on tdst.id = td.test_id
			where test_id <= $test_id
			order by test_id desc limit 3)
	order by sca4_temp asc limit 30) s1
group by subfield_name, sector_name, name HAVING count(name) >= 3

SELECT
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10",
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5"
FROM
(SELECT
  sca4_temp
FROM
  temperature_dt_scas_daily td inner join loop_sensors ls on td.loop_id = ls.loop_id
  inner join subfield_sensors sb on ls.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
WHERE
  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'NNW'
 ) s1

with data as(
	SELECT
	    row_number() OVER () AS id,
		name.sca_name,
	  	name.sca4_temp,
	  	percen."P90",
	  	percen."P50+5",
	  	percen."P50",
		percen."P50-5",
		percen."P10"
	from (SELECT
		  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5",
		  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10"
		FROM
		(SELECT
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on td.loop_id = sca.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'NNW' and sca_position = 4
		) s1) percen,
		(select
		  sca.subfield_id,
		  sca_name,
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on sca.loop_id = td.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'NNW' and sca_position = 4
		order by sca_name asc
		) name
)
(select 
  1 as "join",
	data.id,
	data.sca_name,
	sca4_temp as outlier
from data
where data.sca4_temp <= data."P50-5")

with data as(
	SELECT
	    row_number() OVER () AS id,
		name.sca_name,
	  	name.sca4_temp,
	  	percen."P90",
	  	percen."P50+5",
	  	percen."P50",
		percen."P50-5",
		percen."P10"
	from (SELECT
		  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5",
		  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10"
		FROM
		(SELECT
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on td.loop_id = sca.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'NNW' and sca_position = 4
		) s1) percen,
		(select
		  sca.subfield_id,
		  sca_name,
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on sca.loop_id = td.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'NNW' and sca_position = 4
		order by sca_name asc
		) name
)
(select 
  1 as "join",
	data.id,
	data.sca_name,
	sca4_temp as regular,
	"P90",
	"P50+5",
	"P50",
	"P50-5",
	"P10"
from data
where data.sca4_temp > data."P50-5")

	data.id,
	data.sca_name,
	sca4_temp as outlier
from data
where data.sca4_temp <= data."P50-5")

with data as(
	SELECT
	    row_number() OVER () AS id,
		name.sca_name,
	  	name.sca4_temp,
	  	percen."P90",
	  	percen."P50+5",
	  	percen."P50",
		percen."P50-5",
		percen."P10"
	from (SELECT
		  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
		  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5",
		  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10"
		FROM
		(SELECT
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on td.loop_id = sca.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'SW' and sca_position = 4
		) s1) percen,
		(select
		  sca.subfield_id,
		  sca_name,
		  sca4_temp
		FROM
		  temperature_dt_scas_daily td 
		  inner join sca_sensors sca on sca.loop_id = td.loop_id
		  inner join subfield_sensors sb on sca.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
		  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
		WHERE
		  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'SW' and sca_position = 4
		order by sca_name asc
		) name
)
(select 
  1 as "join",
	data.id,
	data.sca_name,
	sca4_temp as regular,
	"P90",
	"P50+5",
	"P50",
	"P50-5",
	"P10"
from data
where data.sca4_temp > data."P50-5")

SELECT
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)+5 as "P50+5",
  percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P90",
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P50",
  percentile_disc(0.10) within group (order by sca4_temp)   as "P10",
  percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by sca4_temp)-5 as "P50-5"
FROM
(SELECT
  sca4_temp
FROM
  temperature_dt_scas_daily td inner join loop_sensors ls on td.loop_id = ls.loop_id
  inner join subfield_sensors sb on ls.subfield_id = sb.subfield_id
  inner join sector_sensors ss on sb.sector_id = ss.sector_id
WHERE
  test_id = $test_id and ss.name = 'SE'
 ) s1

list.definition:
select to_char(timestamp,  'YYYY/MM/DD')
from temperature_dt_scas_test 
where status LIKE '%done%'
order by 1 desc
list.label: Date
list.name: test_date
list.query:
select to_char(timestamp,  'YYYY/MM/DD')
from temperature_dt_scas_test 
where status LIKE '%done%'
order by 1 desc

list.definition: select id from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote}
list.name: test_id
list.query: select id from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote}

list.definition:
select 
concat(to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/DD/MM HH:MM'), ' -> ', status)
from temperature_dt_scas_test where id = $test_id
list.name: test_status
list.query:
select 
concat(to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/DD/MM HH:MM'), ' -> ', status)
from temperature_dt_scas_test where id = $test_id

list.definition: select EXTRACT(EPOCH from  timestamp )*1000  - 4200000 from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote}
list.name: t_from_temp
list.query: select EXTRACT(EPOCH from  timestamp )*1000  - 4200000 from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote}

list.definition: select EXTRACT(EPOCH from DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp ))*1000  from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote} order by timestamp desc;
list.name: t_from
list.query: select EXTRACT(EPOCH from DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp ))*1000  from temperature_dt_scas_test where to_char(timestamp, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ${test_date:singlequote} order by timestamp desc;
